title: Kumo to Tulip (The Spider and the Tulip)
synopsis: A spider attempts to lure a ladybug into his web. When she manages to escape and hide in a tulip, a storm comes that batters the spider, while the ladybug remains safe.
staff: [['Masaoka, Kenzou', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Script', ' Director of Photography']], ['Kumaki, Kiichirou', ['Planning']], ['Kumakawa, Masao', ['In-Between Animation']]]
